[fusion_title title_type="text" rotation_effect="bounceIn" display_time="1200" highlight_effect="circle" loop_animation="off" highlight_width="9" highlight_top_margin="0" title_link="off" link_target="_self" content_align="center" size="1" text_color="#ffffff" style_type="none" animation_direction="left" animation_speed="0.3" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" sticky_display="normal,sticky"]Welcome to Our Platform[/fusion_title]
[fusion_text rule_style="default" text_color="#ffffff" animation_direction="left" animation_speed="0.3" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" sticky_display="normal,sticky"]
<p style="text-align: center;">Discover the power of seamless page builder translation. Convert your designs between any framework in seconds.</p>
[/fusion_text]

[fusion_builder_row]
[fusion_builder_column type="1_1" layout="1_1"]
[fusion_title title_type="text" content_align="center" size="2" style_type="none"]Key Features[/fusion_title]
[/fusion_builder_column]
[/fusion_builder_row]
[fusion_builder_row]
[fusion_builder_column type="1_3" layout="1_3"]
[fusion_fontawesome icon="fa-exchange-alt fas" size="48px" alignment="center" icon_color="#0073aa"]
[fusion_title title_type="text" content_align="center" size="3"]Universal Translation[/fusion_title]
[fusion_text]
<p style="text-align: center;">Convert between 10 page builders with 90 translation pairs. Support for Bootstrap, DIVI, Elementor, and more.</p>
[/fusion_text]
[/fusion_builder_column]
[fusion_builder_column type="1_3" layout="1_3"]
[fusion_fontawesome icon="fa-magic fas" size="48px" alignment="center" icon_color="#0073aa"]
[fusion_title title_type="text" content_align="center" size="3"]AI-Powered Editing[/fusion_title]
[fusion_text]
<p style="text-align: center;">Edit your pages using natural language with Claude AI. Simply describe the changes you want to make.</p>
[/fusion_text]
[/fusion_builder_column]
[fusion_builder_column type="1_3" layout="1_3"]
[fusion_fontawesome icon="fa-bolt fas" size="48px" alignment="center" icon_color="#0073aa"]
[fusion_title title_type="text" content_align="center" size="3"]30-Second Conversions[/fusion_title]
[fusion_text]
<p style="text-align: center;">What used to take 40 hours of manual rebuilding now takes just 30 seconds with our Translation Bridge.</p>
[/fusion_text]
[/fusion_builder_column]
[/fusion_builder_row]
[/fusion_builder_container]
